document_data.mainbody:
Scriveners Harbor was a temple dedicated to Oghma beneath the Sea of Fallen Stars, in the undersea city of Myth Nantar.
This temple was located on Five Temples Square, in the Trade Quarter of Myth Nantar.
Scriveners Harbor, much like the four other temples of Five Temples Square, was founded in Myth Nantar by immigrant races.
Around the , six priests of this temple were allowed by the Dukars to work and study in Myth Nantars Great Library in return for having their collections of writing merged.
